synopsis.text: To the rhythm of a piano, a solitary figure named Deemo resides in a castle brimming with enigmatic inhabitants. One fateful day, a young girl descends from the heavens, bereft of her memories. In this mystical abode, a sacred tree flourishes with each mellifluous note played on the piano. As Deemo and the girl embark on a heartwarming journey to unravel her forgotten past, they forge an unbreakable bond. But as the tree continues to grow, so does the inevitable truth that threatens their newfound companionship. Prepare to be captivated by this tender tale of love, friendship, and the power of music.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
